channel.title: Wireless Ethernet on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Wireless Ethernet on 0x000216

item.title: What is Ethernet WAN?
item.description: Ethernet WAN is the most significant advancement in business broadband since T1 service prices dropped. What exactly is Ethernet WAN, and why should you care? Ethernet has become the dominant standard for Local Area Networks (LANs). You could say that Ethernet is everywhere. An RJ45 Ethernet jack is standard on every desktop and laptop computer. You might not get a CD-ROM drive, probably won’t get a floppy disc drive, and may never use the phone modem jack again.
